name: 4thGrademathSkillgame
0:
”Alexa begin math game”
”Alexa launch math game and ask me my questions”
”Alexa open math game and ask me my questions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math game
des:
This skill shows how fourth grade math can be taught in an easy-to-use,simple,and interactive way.In this skill,kids can follow alongside Alexa to solve these problems by theirselves.Kids can use these facts in school or in their everyday lives.
 This app works by you asking "Alexa,give me a math fact" and then Alexa will give you a step-by-step process in solving it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
